name: ST. CLAIR COUNTY SHERIFF'S OFFICE
sampleDescriptions: Assist St. Clair County Sheriffs Office in re-negotiating its US Marshals Service Intergovernmental Agreement to house federal prisoners.
Assist St. Clair County Sheriffs Office in re-negotiating its US Marshals Service Intergovernmental Agreement to house federal prisoners.
Assist the St. Clair County Sheriffs Office with issues related to the re-negotiation of its US Marshals Service Intergovernmental Agreement for housing federal prisoners.
